message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. Would you consider accepting this price?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $14,000 is already a competitive price.  Could you meet me halfway at $12,000?
